ing: 3 (16 ounce) packages frozen baby lima beans
3 cups diced ham, or to taste
1 slice processed cheese food (such as VelveetaÂ®)
n: Leftover Ham and Lima Bean Soup
des: "Great for leftover ham after the holidays!"
ins: Bring lima beans, ham, water, onion, potato, butter, processed cheese, cornstarch, celery salt, and pepper to a boil in a large pot. Stir until butter is melted. Reduce heat to medium-low and simmer until beans are tender, about 1 hour.
